accessibility.description: Name of category for accessibility tests.

analyzeAgainButtonLabel.description: Label for button to restart analysis.

startScanButtonLabel.description: Label for button to start analysis.

scanAgainButtonLabel.description: Label for button to scan again.

newScanButtonLabel.description: Label for button to configure a new scan.

cancelAnalysisButtonLabel.description: Label for button to stop analysis.

categoriesTitle.description: Title of the categories sub-section on the configuration page.

checkForBestPracticesDescription.message: Check for best practices and common errors with your site's accessibility, speed, security, and more.
checkForBestPracticesDescription.description: Brief description of what webhint does.

compatibility.description: Name of category for compatibility tests.

development.description: Name of category for development tests.

differentOriginLabel.description: Label for option to ignore only external resources on the page.

errorDetails.description: Text displayed for option to expand and show error details.

errorMessage.message: There was an error running webhint. Please try again. If the error still occurs:
errorMessage.description: Message informing users what to do when an error occurs.

hintCountLabel.description: Label for a test result based on the order in which it is listed, e.g. 'hint 2:'.

scanResultTitle.description: Label for the title in the header in the result page.

hintIssuesLabel.description: Label for count of hints with issues, e.g. 'Hints: 2'.

hintsTitle.description: Title displayed for the tool tab.

ignoredResourcesTitle.description: Title of the ignored resouces sub-section on the configuration page.

learnWhyLabel.description: Label for link to additional documentation for a passed test.

learnWhyAndHowLabel.message: Learn why this is important and how to fix it
learnWhyAndHowLabel.description: Label for link to additional documentation for a failed test.

noIssuesLabel.description: Label for a hint with no issues.

noneLabel.description: Label for option to not ignore any resources on the page.

openAnIssue.description: Text for a link to open an issue.

other.description: Name of category for miscellaneous tests.

passedStatus.description: Message shown when all tests have passed.

performance.description: Name of category for performance tests.

pitfalls.description: Name of category for tests which identify common mistakes.

poweredByLabel.description: Label displayed before link to the webhint website.

pwa.description: Name of category for progressive web app (PWA) tests.

recommendedSettingsLabel.description: Label for option to use recommended target browsers.

restoreDefaultsLabel.description: Label for button to restore default settings.

security.description: Name of category for security tests.

seeExpressionInstructionsLabel.description: Label for link to instructions for ignoring page resources.

seeQueryInstructionsLabel.description: Label for link to instructions for selecting target browsers.

showPassedHintsLabel.description: Label for toggle to hide/show groups of hints which passed.

statAverageLoadTimeForMobileSites.message: The average load time for mobile sites is $1 seconds over 3G connections.
statAverageLoadTimeForMobileSites.description: Statistic about the average load time for mobile websites.

statJavaScriptTakesMoreToProcessThanJPEG.message: 1MB of JavaScript takes more time to process than 1MB of a JPEG file.
statJavaScriptTakesMoreToProcessThanJPEG.description: Statistic about how JavaScript is more expensive to load.

statMedianSiteSize.description: Statistic about the average site size.

statMobileSiteVisitsAbandonedByLoad.message: $1% of mobile site visits are abandoned if pages take longer than $2 seconds to load.
statMobileSiteVisitsAbandonedByLoad.description: Statistic about the percent drop-off of mobile visits based on load times.

statResourcesAreNotCacheable.description: Statistic about the precentage of web resources which can't be cached.

statSitesCompressResourcesTheyShouldNot.message: $1% of sites compress at least one resource they shouldn't.
statSitesCompressResourcesTheyShouldNot.description: Statistic about the percentage of websites which needlessly compress.

statSitesForgetToCompressResources.message: $1% of sites forget to compress one or more resources.
statSitesForgetToCompressResources.description: Statistic about the percentage of websites which forget to compress.

statWebsitesPerformARedirect.message: $1% of websites perform a redirect for at least one resource.
statWebsitesPerformARedirect.description: Statistic about the percentage of websites performing redirects.

statWebsitesUsingLibrariesWithKnownVulne.message: $1% of websites use a JavaScript library with known vulnerabilities.
statWebsitesUsingLibrariesWithKnownVulne.description: Statistic about the percentage of websites with vulnerable libraries.

targetBrowsersTitle.description: Title of the target browsers sub-section on the configuration page.

targetUrl.description: Label for the result page with the url analyzed.
